snippet: Roku, one of the earliest makers of a box for streaming Internet video to televisions, is developing a product that lets people watch Web video without a box. The product, the Roku Streaming Stick, slips unobtrusively into an HDMI jack on the back of...
abstract: Roku, one of the earliest makers of a box for streaming Internet video to televisions, is developing a product that lets people watch Web video without a box. The product, the Roku Streaming Stick, slips unobtrusively into an HDMI jack on the back of a TV.

headline.main: Roku Looks Beyond the Set-Top Box
